code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";export var getUsers=function getUsers(state){return state.users.users;};export var getPageSize=function getPageSize(state){return state.users.pagingSize;};export var getStartPosition=function getStartPosition(state){return state.users.startPosition;};export var getTotalUsersCount=function getTotalUsersCount(state){return state.users.totalUsersCount;};export var getCurrentPage=function getCurrentPage(state){return state.users.currentPage;};export var getIsFetching=function getIsFetching(state){return state.users.isFetching;};export var getCurrentUserIDS=function getCurrentUserIDS(state){return state.users.currentUserID;};export var getFollowingInProgress=function getFollowingInProgress(state){return state.users.followingInProgress;};export var getIsAuth=function getIsAuth(state){return state.auth.isAuth;};export var getUserSpecial=createSelector(getUsers,function(users){return users.filter(function(u){return true;});});
